name: The Basement (Chubek)
description:
A short FPS PSX prototype made over a weekend.

The premise:

You are a security guard in an old hospital going on about your graveyard shift when suddenly the lights go out. 

Controls:

  • WSAD - Movement
  • E - Interact
  • Space - Jump
  • CTRL - Crouch
  • Right mouse button - Zoom
